pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy | Palacio de AmazingHotel Amazing Hotel Rooms About Our playing place To book Privacy Policy In this Privacy Policy, any use of the words "you", "yours" or similar expressions shall mean any user of this website whatsoever. Terms such as "we", "us, "our" or similar expressions shall refer to AmazingHotel is the product of AmazingHotel Private Limited This privacy policy pertains to the treatment of information provided or collected on the website. It further clarifies the treatment of information provided or collected on applications we make available on third-party sites or platforms, if disclosed to you in connection with use of the application. This Privacy Policy is followed in accordance with the municipal law in India, particularly the Information Technology Act, 2000 and Art 21 of the Indian Constitution. Please read the following carefully to understand our views and practices regarding your personal data and how we will treat it. We collect two basic types of information – personal information and anonymous information – and we may use personal and anonymous information to create a third type of information, aggregate information. We collect the following categories of information: The security, integrity and confidentiality of your information is of paramount concern to us. Amazon Web Service shall be used for DATA STORAGE. We have implemented technical, administrative and physical security measures that are designed to protect guest information from unauthorized access, disclosure, use and modification. From time to time, we review our security procedures to consider appropriate new technology and methods. Your personal information will be retained by the company for the requisite length of time needed to fulfil the purposes outlined in this privacy policy unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. Furthermore, we encourage you to be aware when you leave our sites or applications and to read the privacy policies of other sites that may collect your personal information. Use of information by A member of AmazingHotel Private Limited which includes many different brands, will be the data controller for your information. Other members of AmazingHotel Private Limited may have access to your information where they perform services on behalf of the data controller(s) and, unless prohibited under applicable law, for use on their own behalf (as a data controller) for the following purposes: At any stage subsequently you may inform us that you no longer wish to receive information from us or third parties to which we have passed your data by clicking on the designated hyperlink at the bottom of the relevant communication. If you have chosen to receive emails from a particular team, your data will be passed onto that club accordingly, will be held in accordance with their privacy policy, and the club is to be contacted directly if you no longer wish to receive communications. Data stored on this website is stored in a secure manner and we shall adopt appropriate measures to ensure that any such data cannot be accessed by an unauthorized third party. Disclosure of Information All information submitted to us by you will be held in accordance with our responsibilities under of the Information Technology Act, 2000; Art 21 of the Constitution and related legislation. Pursuant to the aforementioned, we will not disclose any personal information to any third party other than: as required as a matter of law; in the reasonable enforcement of our contractual rights; to identify or resolve technical problems arising from the use of the website; to deal with complaints from any party regarding the operation of the website; as otherwise set out in this Privacy Policy or in those parts of the Website where we collect your personal details. Cookies To improve the effectiveness & experience of our game sites for our Users, we use "cookies", or such similar electronic tools to collect information to assign each visitor a unique random number as a User Identification (User ID) to understand the User's individual interests using the identified computer. Unless the User intends to identify himself/herself (e.g, through registration), AmazingHotel Private Limited has no knowledge of the identity of the User, even if a cookie is assigned to the User's computer. The only personal information a cookie can contain is information supplied by the User. Our advertisers may also assign their own cookies to the User's browser (provided the User clicks on their ad banners), a process that is not within the control of AmazingHotel Private Limited. IP Address AmazingHotel Private Limited web servers automatically collect basic information in relation to the User's device’s connection to the Internet, including the User's IP address, when the User visits our site. The User's IP address does not identify the User personally. We use this information to deliver its web pages to Users upon request, to tailor the site to the interests of its users, to gauge traffic within its site and let advertisers know the geographic locations of those who visit the website. Links to other websites and advertisements AmazingHotel Private Limited also includes links to other websites. The concerned websites are subject to the privacy policy of the websites which may differ from our Privacy Policy and is beyond the scope of our Privacy Policy. The User may contact the site directly for more information if the User is unable find the privacy policy of any of these sites via a link from the site's homepage. When information is presented to its online advertisers with the pretext of helping them understand our audience and confirm the value of advertising on our website, it is conveyed in the form of aggregated statistics on traffic to various pages within our site. Amazing Hotel Home About Our playing place Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions Disclaimer 45 Tyne Street, Invercargill 9810, New Zealand +44-20-5785-5212 amazinghotel@gmail.com
